mapper.select: SELECT titulo, UPPER(DATE_FORMAT(fecha, '%d %b')) as fecha, DATE_FORMAT(fecha, '%H:%i') as hora, CONCAT(CONVERT(sum(precio), CHAR), ' €') as precioPersona, concat(sum(precio) * asistentes, ' €') as precioTotal FROM evento, actividad, ( SELECT count(1) as asistentes FROM usu_even WHERE id_evento = #{idEvento} ) aux WHERE id_actividad IN ( SELECT id_actividad FROM even_act WHERE id_evento = #{idEvento} ) AND id_evento = #{idEvento}
SELECT id_usuario as id, nombre, picture FROM usuario WHERE id_usuario IN ( SELECT id_usuario FROM usu_even WHERE id_evento = #{idEvento} )

SELECT a.nombre, em.nombre AS nombreEmpresa, em.lat, em.lon, a.precio, DATE_FORMAT(ev.fecha,'%d/%m') as fecha, DATE_FORMAT(ev.fecha,'%H:%i') as hora FROM actividad a, empresa em, evento ev WHERE a.id_empresa = em.id_empresa AND a.tipo = 'R' AND id_actividad IN ( SELECT id_actividad FROM even_act WHERE id_evento = #{idEvento} ) AND ev.id_evento = #{idEvento} UNION SELECT a.nombre, em.nombre AS nombreEmpresa, em.lat, em.lon, a.precio, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(ev.fecha, INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%d/%m') as fecha, '00:00' as hora FROM actividad a, empresa em, evento ev WHERE a.id_empresa = em.id_empresa AND a.tipo = 'C' AND id_actividad IN ( SELECT id_actividad FROM even_act WHERE id_evento = #{idEvento} ) AND ev.id_evento = #{idEvento} ORDER BY fecha, hora
